overview.title: Overview
overview.description: Discover the exceptional features of this vehicle
overview.general_description: Whether you're a first-time visitor or a seasoned Las Vegas aficionado, The High Roller promises an unparalleled experience that will leave you in awe. With its climate-controlled cabins and immersive audio commentary, this attraction provides a unique opportunity to see Las Vegas from a whole new perspective, while learning about its rich history and famous landmarks along the way.

items.insurance: Free cancellation up to 48 hours before pick-up

q1.title: Is The High Roller suitable for all ages?
q1.answer: Absolutely! The High Roller offers a family-friendly experience suitable for visitors of all ages. Children must be accompanied by an adult.

q2.title: How long does a full rotation on The High Roller take?
q2.answer: A complete rotation on The High Roller takes approximately 30 minutes, giving you ample time to enjoy panoramic views of the Las Vegas skyline.

q3.title: Can I bring food or drinks aboard The High Roller?
q3.answer: Outside food and beverages are not permitted on The High Roller. However, there are nearby dining options at The LINQ Promenade where you can enjoy a meal before or after your ride.

q4.title: Is The High Roller wheelchair accessible?
q4.answer: Yes, The High Roller cabins are wheelchair accessible, making it possible for everyone to enjoy the breathtaking views of Las Vegas.

how_it_works.title: How it works?
how_it_works.subtitle: Our rental system works as follows

location.title: Choose location
location.description: Select the ideal destination to start your journey with ease.

vehicle.title: Choose your vehicle
vehicle.description: Explore our fleet and find the perfect car for your needs.

verification.title: Verification
verification.description: Review your information and confirm your reservation

start_journey.title: Start your journey
start_journey.description: We will contact you to confirm your reservation and start your journey.

vehicle_protection.title: Vehicle Protection
vehicle_protection.description: CDW and LDW insurance cover damage from collisions, theft, or accidents during the rental period.

third_party.title: Third Party Protection
third_party.description: ALI and SLI protection for third-party vehicles involved in collisions with your rental car.

deposit.title: Security Deposit
deposit.description: A security deposit is required which is blocked on your card and released upon return of the vehicle.

extras.title: Optional Extras
extras.description: You can add extras to your reservation such as GPS and baby or child seats. Add them now so you don't have to worry about it during your trip!

additional_driver.title: Additional Driver
additional_driver.description: If someone else will also be driving the car, they must sign the contract as an additional driver and meet the requirements for renting a car such as: necessary documentation and minimum driving age.

mileage.title: Mileage
mileage.description: Check if your reservation includes unlimited mileage or not. Unlimited mileage means you can drive as much as you want without paying any extra for the kilometers driven.
